review: For the money, this gadget is unbeatable. You can use it on multiple TV's (not at the same time) and the picture quality is excellent. To the naked eye, the difference between 720 and 1080 is virtually non-existent. If you sit closer that 10' and have a screen that is over 65", you might want to be prepared for a very slight difference. Stream from multiple TV apps, Amazon, Netflix, YouTube, Hulu, the list goes on.

review: If you are a Verizon FiOS subscriber and use one of their routers do not waste your time ordering this device. Due to Verizon's stake in Redbox, their routers will not recognize or synch with the device. Spent a good couple of hours trying a variety of workarounds found on the Net and Verizon message boards none of which worked. I gave it the rating I did because of the incompatibility issues. Check with Chromecast's FAQ page before placing your order to make sure it works with your router.
